fileList.name: fileList
fileList.description:
Array containing the list of file objects
FileItem:
{
    file: File;
    status: FileStatus;
    progress: number;
    icon: IconOptions
    errorMessage: string;
}

| Name | Description | Default |
| --- | --- | --- |
| file | Attached file | |
| status | Status of file | 'completed' |
| progress | Progress percent of `Progress Ring` | 0 |
| icon | Name of the icon to be rendered |
| errorMessage | Error Message to be shown when status is `error` | 'Network Error' |

onClick.name: onClick
onClick.description: Callback called when file item is clicked

actionRenderer.name: actionRenderer
actionRenderer.description: Actions to be rendered inside the file item

data-test.name: data-test
data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.
